page.title: 02Communications,Cribyn
page.content: Communication has altered through the years and by now most people have {phones}in their homes. For the ones without phones there are {phone boxes}scattered in the country but are sometimes vandalised.We have tall red{phone boxes}here.In one part of Cardiff they are orange and in some cities yellow.Our{phone box}in Cribyn stands by the door of the{Post Office.Many young boys have{C.B}in their cars and like communicating with others insted of going out of the car and to a phone. The{Post Office}in Cribyn stands on the square . It is many things,a grocery,{Post Office}and even a small farm.You can buy stamps and post letters.Sweets,cards and china are sold .Our little{Post Office}saves a lot of travelling to the nearest town Lampeter.There are no phones in cars.
